comment: Just very unorganized. Semester long project ended up falling apart on her end before the final submission was due. Very vague slides that have no supplemental materials. No excused attendance. Great person, but overall seems like she was unprepared for the semester and the students suffered the consequences.
rating_tags: Group projects--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Don't let the other reviews scare you! Professor Michaelson was a great teacher. I took her MKTG 4650 course and it was NOT as bas as the other reviews make it seem. You have one major group project due throughout the semester. Her class actually gives you a taste of what it's like working for a real agency. I would definitely recommend her!

Seriously do not take her. The worst class I have ever taken in college and my lowest grade I have ever received in college. She is unclear on expectations for assignments, grades extremely harsh, makes things impossible to find and assignments easy to miss. Social Media marketing should not have been this hard of a class. do not take!!!

DO NOT TAKE the worst professor I have had. From the beginning I should have known because IF she decided to respond to emails it always came off rude. Was very excited about this class and she found a way to ruin that. Most of our class failed our final, and she claimed she will not be curving it. You would be lucky to end up with a C.only 2 exams

I took this class online, and it was not a ton of work, nor was it that hard. However, her feedback on assignments was incredibly vague, and her tests may be the worst I have ever taken. Her tests include very subjective criteria that could have more than one answer. Would not recommend.
rating_tags: Tough grader--EXTRA CREDIT--Graded by few things

comment: Love this Prof!! Good grades in her class are earned and not just given out. She gave multiple extra credit opportunities throughout the semester. 2 tests, 5 assignments, and a handful of discussion questions each semester. Learned so much in this class!

Laurie Michaelson is the best professor I have ever had. She cares so much about her students and their future. She is bringing something different to the table than other professors; she gives you real-world examples rather than textbook examples. This woman is amazing and inspiring. I could not say enough great things about her. TAKE HER!
Never take her. So cryptic with assignment instructions, little time to do them, rude, doesn't respond to emails, etc.

she's honestly the worst professor ive ever had. she's rude and jokes about students not doing well in her class. she releases assignments on Friday and has them due Monday. she never gives clear instructions even when specifically asked. she gives difficult group and individual papers every week. ive never had so many people drop in my class.

DO NOT TAKE HER!!!! NOT ONLY DOES SHE MAKE A SIMPLE CLASS DIFFICULT SHE ALSO DOES NOT CARE ABOUT STUDENTS NEEDS AND SIMPLY DOESN'T RESPOND TO EMAILS. CONSTANT PROJECTS THAT SHE ONLY GIVES 2 DAYS (OVER THE WEEKEND) TO COMPLETE BECAUSE DOES NOT RELEASE PROJECT INSTRUCTIONS UNTIL 2 DAYS PRIOR. I have never seen so many people drop a class before.

Very nice if you are on good terms with here, shes a florida state girl so if certain words offend you, beat it.  Missed a few things and went and talked with her and she helped me out. Not the most clear on instructions but shes easy to look at!
rating_tags: Tough grader--EXTRA CREDIT--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Usually don't give feedback but I think other students should be aware of this professor. She is inconsistent in grading and provides zero to little feedback when you ask. Found countless errors in her syllabus, assignment instructions, and in her own blog site. Very contradicting. For an easy class, she makes it hard and frustrating. DO NOT TAKE!
Really harsh grader

I took Laurie for both Social Media Marketing and Advertising. If you want to start your career in marketing or advertising please take her! She can be a very tough grader but she really knows her stuff and will help you if you just ask and are willing to make corrections based on her feedback. Put in the effort and and your grade will reflect it.
Dose not give clear direction then grades heavy without clear rubric .

I'm gonna be honest with you I learned absolutely nothing in this class. There were 3 or 4 tests that are intentionally made to just confuse you. With 75 multiple choice questions with 5 questions each that are only one word off of the right answer. I would strongly not recommend this class to anyone. Reading textbook for tests was useless.

Terrible Communicator don't take her class she gave me an 80 on our final project because the audio didn't work on HER computer but worked on all 4 of my teammates computer and didn't change the grade. Adds grades late and has a terrible class format on d2l hard to follow her schedule.

For an online class this was a BOATLOAD of work for an entry level marketing class. 4 tests (75 questions + lockdown webcam), 20 quizzes (10 questions each), 10 packback assignements (3 of which are full blown essays), a group project worth 260 points total. Take someone if you can.
Do not take this professor. Unnecessary amount of busy work and the tests are ridiculous.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Test heavy

comment: This class was just a rough experience. Almost nothing in the syllabus was followed, it takes forever (if at all) to get an email back, the set up of the course is chaotic and has lots of issues, and it's extremely difficult to get good grades in this class. I am usually a straight A student and I struggled to even get a B in this class.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Group projects

comment: She had a lot of pointless busy work and she also didn't do very good job grading/responding to problems! I can not be more clear with my words... DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS! The work is not hard but is countless hours of busy work and uses baby websites instead of d2l. DO NOT MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE I DID. WAS NOT WORTH COUNTLESS HOURS OF NON SENSE!!!!

I have picture evidence of her deleting my posts and then give me 0s for them claiming I didn't do them. I want to speak to a higher up(someone who actually is going to help) immediately and if anyone can please give me their contact info id be glad to go ahead and end her teaching career. SHE NEEDS TO FACE CONSEQUENCES... DO NOT TAKE THIS PHYSCO!

If you are an online student, DO NOT TAKE HER!!! She takes 3+ days to respond to emails, and when she does respond the response does not answer the questions asked. I received a 0% on an assignment for turning it in EARLY! She is also terrible at grading and waits till the last minute to send out "study guides" with incorrect material.

She was top 2 professors I've ever taken- and not #2! This class requires effort but she provides all the tools necessary for you to succeed. The class requires effort but it's very doable. There are no exams in the class but there are a couple of semester projects (group & individual). Assignments are fun and very hands-on!

There is a lot of busy work, however none of it is that hard. If you're lazy don't take this class. A lot of people didn't show up to class and wondered why they got bad grades. If you don't show up, she will grade you lower. You have quizzes once a week, a blog project, and a final project. She could sometimes be unpredictable with grades.

If you enjoy busy work this class is for you. Its not difficult, it just takes countless hours. The project is by far the worst Ive ever seen. Ive also learned nothing. After working in Marketing for two years I can easily say none of this had anything to do with the job or couldnt easily be googled. Such a waste of time and money. Dont take.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: This class was harder than calculus for me. It was an unnecessary amount of busywork. The group project is very poorly explained, and her grading is completely subjective. I am a Finance major and this was a required class. It was essentially a colossal waste of time and money. If you can avoid this class, I would recommend it.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: Blog Project, Company Analysis paper, handful of quizzes, handful of (easy) homework assignments, midterm, and final. The quizzes, midterm, and final are all super easy! Watch her lectures and youll get As. Professor M is super sweet, replies to emails quickly, and gives interesting info! The blog project is work, but also enjoyable. Take her!!

Professor is unorganized, the material is highly subjective, and harder than it needs to be. If you take this class, make sure you ask for missed questions on exams and question the professor when you know you are correct. When emailing her a question, she somehow dodges the question, so another email has to be sent. Does not follow syllabus.

I took this class as a summer course, and it was super doable! Be sure to set reminders for yourself to do your blog posts weekly. Just because you don't submit your blog every week doesn't mean that she won't check the dates listed. Group project is long and tedious, so make sure you get a head start, because it's the majority of your grade.

Very sweet lady and knowledgeable. Talks about herself a lot because she has experience but it gets boring. The projects are pretty easy and you are in a group, and tests are kind of hard. She makes them from scratch so you need to study and go to test reviews. KEEP UP WITH YOUR BLOG PROJECT. She grades hard on it.
